parisara hithakami jiwitha ratawakata men ma balashakthi sanrakshana ki‡∑ärayadamayakata rate ma janathawa yomu karawima da me parshadaye adahas wadagath weyi.ratema yuda shakthiya samanga tha‡∑ärasthawadaya parajaya kirimata suwishesha aithihasika karyabharayak karana aarakshaka hamudawe daskam penwana hamuda parshadaya dayata kirula pa‡∑äradarshanaye suwisheshama parshadaya wanawata sakayak natha.pasugiya dayata kirula pa‡∑äradarshanaye wadima pirisak narambau me parshadayata mewara thi‡∑ärawidha hamudawa wishesha karya balakaya polisiya samanga siwil aarakshaka departhamenthuwa da aarakshaka amathyanshaya da ekwa siti.yuda hamudawe sannaha sannaddha rathamehi pe‡∑ärrudathwaya penwana kageth sith ada ganna manaram pa‡∑äradarshana bala pa‡∑äradeshaya guwan hamudawe kotasayi.

duushana mardana lekam karyalayata labunu mulma paminili athara janatha wimukthi peramunen labunu paminilla pa‡∑äradhana wiya.pasugiya rajaya samaye 2007 wasaredi yukrenayen miladi ganunu mig 27 wargaye pa‡∑äraharaka yana sambandha ganudenuwa nithiyanukulawa siduwa thibeda,ema ganudenuwen kawara ho pudgalayekuta wishala komis mudalak himiwa thibeda aadi karunu gana wimarshanayak kala yuthuyayi ehi sadahan wiya.jathika hela urumayada paminillak idiripath karamin hitapu aarakshaka mandala lekam gamini senarath mahatha ohu ema dhuraya daru samaye athpath karagath depala sambandhayen soyabaliya yuthu bawa kiweya.jathika hela urumaya mema paminilla miita pera awasthawaka deshiya aadayam departhamenthuwatada idiripath kara thibunaki.eksath jathika pakshaya idiripath kara thibunu paminille sadahanwuye hitapu aarthika sanwardhana amathya basil rajapaksha mahatha ohuge diwi naguma wyapruthiyata labadun mudal bhawitha kara thibena aakaraya wimarshanaya kala yuthu bawaya.pasugiya sathiye parlimenthuwedi basil rapaksha mahathata thawath sathi 3 ka niwaduwak labadima sammatha wiya.janawarii masa 8 wanida janadhipathiwaranayen pasu basil rajapaksha mahatha hinsiruwe shi‡∑äralankawen lissa amarikawe los anjalis nuwara thama niwasa bala giyeya.

me anuwa, adhyapana samaja sathkaraka wadasatahan yatathe komarshal bankuwa sidukarana pradhana karya bharaya wanne rata pura thibena pasalwalata awashya angasampurna pariganaka puhunu madhyasthana 82 k labadi thibena athara eyin sisu daru dariyan 40,000 kata wadi pirisak prathilabha labathi.
